info.name: Full on crisp google inbox
info.description:
All this theme does is to change the fonts in google inbox to a more readable "crisp" font.
I'd prefer the entire web that way but that might be just me =) Hope you like it.
info.additionalInfo:
Version History

1.0 - probably won't update this theme unless I find out I missed something. Shoot me a message if you notice anything
